Subject: Re: Scorponoks mission
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

OOC:Allrighty then
BIC:
Scorponk again tears over now getting close to spain. He hasnt had a chance
to get this kind of action since bumping into Terrosaur. It felt good, and
he enjoyed his new mode. Taking in the sights he thought to himself, he's
never been around here before, but so many suprises have come up since
there was only fourteen robots waging war, to all these new armys.
"Aproaching what will be called France" hummed his computer. He may take a
while, but he didnt care, he again had a purpose.
